titles: A ciuile nosgay wherin is contayned not onelye the offyce and dewty of all magestrates and iudges but also of of [sic] all subiectes with a preface concernynge the lyberty of iustice in this our tyme newly collected and gethered out of latyn and so translated in to the Inglyshe tonge by I.G.
author: Melanchthon, Philipp, 1497-1560.
Goodale, John.
publisher: Imprynted by me Robart wyer, for Ihon goodale,
notes: Imprint from colophon; suggested publication date and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
